data.message: Please stop showing suggestions from the marketplace in my newsfeed. I have no interest in the marketplace and if I ever do, I will go to the menu. I have clicked “I do not want to see this” a dozen or more times and it keep coming back!

replies.message: Hi Laura. Sounds like you may have encountered a bug. When there's a problem on Facebook we want to resolve it quickly. Learn how to report what you're experiencing here: http://bit.ly/2n9PLOj. -Tenaya
